editorialNotes.tagline: New ways to sketch and animate
editorialNotes.standard: Procreate lets you generate high-caliber artwork at a blistering pace using a robust layering system, stunning filters, and thousands of importable brushes. Plus, Savage Interactive’s super-intuitive app supports pressure sensitivity and Apple Pencil—as well as iCloud Drive and a seamless video recording of each brushstroke—so sharing your work is incredibly simple.
editorialNotes.short: This super-intuitive app makes it simple to paint your next masterpiece.
Learn to read and pronounce words with your new friend!
editorialNotes.tagline: Learn to read with a friend
The tools for your first draft

ios.subtitle: Make a routine & put on a show

editorialNotes.standard: Bursting with beats and energy, Toca Dance will make the whole family want to get up and groove. This incredibly cute game puts kids in charge of their own musical production—choosing dancers, costumes, and techno tracks, and choreographing moves using simple swipes and taps. Once the performance starts, the real fun begins: you can fling items at the stage, set off pyrotechnics and other cool effects, and even cheer (or boo) your squad. Seeing the payoff—an awesome video you can share—will encourage players to jump right back in and start working on their next great show.

name: e-Sword HD: Bible Study to Go

ios.subtitle: Study the Bible fast and easy!

editorialNotes.standard: Wherever you are on your filmmaking journey, LumaFusion meets you there. This multitrack video editor offers pros the features rarely found in an iPad app, all accessible through an intuitive touch interface that even beginners can get the hang of.
editorialNotes.short: Apply transitions, effects and more with these powerful editing tools.

ios.subtitle: Install all the fonts you love

editorialNotes.short: Try a wild new look – risk-free!

editorialNotes.standard: Everyone needs a task manager—and Things is adaptable enough for anyone. This Apple Design Award winner is crisp and lightweight, featuring a simple but effective interface. The ever-present Magic Plus button makes it easy to add to-dos from anywhere in the app, and organizing items is as simple as dragging them where you want them. It’s like the unicorn of productivity tools: deep enough for serious work, surprisingly easy to use, and gorgeous enough to enjoy staring at.
editorialNotes.short: Organise class projects, assignments and daily to-do lists.

name: Don't Let Pigeon Run This App!

editorialNotes.short: Help yourself resist distractions from your device.

ios.subtitle: A place to start musical ideas

editorialNotes.standard: Pixelmator sets a new standard for photo editing on iPhone and iPad with a suite of staggeringly powerful tools. Combining gorgeous templates, intuitive touch-screen controls, and completely customizable effects, this full-featured editor is in a class all its own. Plus, with seamless syncing using iCloud Drive, it doesn’t matter where the project was started—you can keep editing on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac.
editorialNotes.short: Make your pictures shine with this professional set of photography tools.

ios.subtitle: The fun way to learn to write

editorialNotes.standard: Learning the ABCs is child's play with this entertaining and educational app. Adorable artwork, colorful creatures, and smooth voice and sound effects enhance an already engaging hands-on experience that makes spelling each and every word an interactive puzzle.

The moment we met wee kitty Crumbs in Little Kitten, we let out an audible “awww.” This adorable digital feline encourages children to play and explore, interacting with the lively toys and simple games in Crumbs’ room. We’re amazed by the cinematic animation, and appreciate the sleep timer that sends Crumbs to bed when our kids’ screen time is over.
editorialNotes.short: Embark on exciting adventures with your own kitty pal.
Elevate your creativity through colourful caleidoscopic designs.

editorialNotes.standard: Nothing beats a kid-friendly game that keeps the whole family captivated—and Toca has us snipping, straightening, and styling to our heart's content. Once we've perfected our customer's silly new ‘dos, we make sure to add some accessories, snap a pic, and share the hair.

editorialNotes.short: See internal organs in action: lungs breathe, muscles bend and nerves respond to a pinprick.

editorialNotes.tagline: Check in and get ready to fly
